text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
A little progress each day adds up to big results. Stay consistent!
Your body deserves the same attention you give to your phone. Recharge wisely!
Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
One workout at a time, one meal at a time, one day at a time. You've got this!
Sleep early. Eat clean. Move daily. Repeat.
Energy flows where attention goes. Focus on your health today.
You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
Your future self will thank you for showing up today.
Big goals are achieved by small daily habits.
